body: Hi Ilona, Thank you for reporting this. I cannot reproduce the problem on my system. Can you connect a panel to the output of components and send me the full text, so I can see in which line the error happens? Also the output of blsgPrograms is a list and you probably want to select one of them and apply it to your zones. Image below: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Zv0e1bgizgIzix6rYOW6Gbw-lPPa45dvVnW7u9IbkXxUNpJF918LpN37srwOcnAaFvAdG*KYdzRe1bGvBOEToSsk3vWCAa7O/prepareModel.png) Thanks, Mostapha
